alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Hennepin, eastern Sibley and Carver Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cologne to near Henderson. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chaska around 530 PM CDT. Victoria and St. Bonifacius around 535 PM CDT. Mound, Orono, Minnetrista, Norwood Young America and Maple Plain around 540 PM CDT. Waconia, Medina and Independence around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mayer, Corcoran, Watertown, Rogers, Delano and Rockford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
